subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: While the operation is not serious, it underlines the age issues that the Yankees have to confront with Jorge Posada, who turned 39 this past season and may be entering the final year of his major league career.
snippet: While the operation is not serious, it underlines the age issues that the Yankees have to confront with Jorge Posada, who turned 39 this past season and may be entering the final year of his major league career.
